metadata.title: CVE-2016-7477 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - low
metadata.description: The ff_put_pixels8_xy2_mmx function in rnd_template.c in Libav 11.7 allowsremote attackers to cause a denial of service (invalid memory access andcrash) via a crafted mp3 file.  NOTE: this issue was originally reported asinvolving a NULL pointer dereference.

criterions.comment: libav: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue.
